name: Wp Super Login
author: WpAJANS

sections.description:
Wp Super Login plugin, It adds a nice introduction to the theme.
We will also bring more updates to the availability of 3 languages.
These languages are English, French and Turkish.
sections.installation:
Please follow these steps to install the plugin.

  1. Upload wp-super-login to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Wp Super Login’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php if(function_exists('login_add')) { login_add(); } ?> in your templates
sections.changelog:

  • The inputs required add.

  • allows users to enter record ensures that there is.
  • some bugs have been fixed.
  • Accelerated and improved.
  • users are pricing their passwords themselves.
  • e-mail confirmation removed.
  • Users automatically when input or output is being redirected to the main page.
  • The admin panel more modern still came

1.2

  • Seven with the option adapts to the different theme each site.
  • when a member login or quit, automaticly you will go main page
  • Some errors fixed.
  • The system is more fast now
  • Easy and lovely views are provide.
  • when a member is register, member will choose the password

1.1

  • Choose a Theme Options is coming.
  • You can make your Own Theme.
  • Remember Options.

1.0

An excellent introduction plugin for wordpress
